name: Mega Construction Builder
description:
Mega Construction Builder!!!
Test your skills as the construction driver on a duty to build home & construct city roads. The flow of the traffic has stopped due to rough roads and land sliding. Drive the truck to the construction and start your work today.
Feature:
- Realistic and amazing 3D graphics
- Easy to play
- Multiple game play
- Different angle views
- Stunning 3D graphics and smooth wheel steering of tractor excavator
